snippet: Citing public executions, Secretary of State John Kerry said the North Korean leader’s behavior increased the likelihood he would face charges at The Hague.
lead_paragraph: Citing public executions, Secretary of State John Kerry said the North Korean leader’s behavior increased the likelihood he would face charges at The Hague.

headline.main: Kerry Calls for More Pressure on North Korea Over ‘Horrendous’ Acts

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
